item.description:
It seems Sunday will be a beautiful day. Let's start it off with a hike.

I plan to start at the Trailside Museum and start on the red dot. From there we will travel along the blue loop and wander off onto less used paths.

Plan for a good 2-3 hours in the woods. Please bring enough water and snacks for you and your pets. This will be an easy hike at a decent pace. I don't plan to rush nor do I plan to stroll. Feel free to forward me an email if you have any questions.

As always I will adjust plans for the desires of the group and if anyone needs to leave early I can always point you in the right direction.

If you get lost or have trouble finding us please feel free to call me at 508-510-1136.
item.how_to_find_us: I am the tall guy with the pitbulls and green Chevy pickup
item.name: Sunday In The Blue Hills
